==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Colloquial form of the departing-tone variant of {{ltc-l|作|to do|id=2}}, to differentiate from the checked-tone variant (now represented by {{lang|zh|作}}). Loss of checked codas in Mandarin has resulted in homophony of the two.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[do]]; to [[perform]]
#: {{zh-x|你 在 做 什麼？|What are you '''doing'''?}}
#: {{zh-x|你 做 緊 乜嘢 呀？|What are you '''doing'''?|C-GZ}}
# to [[make]]; to [[produce]]
# to [[become]]
# to [[give]] (a party, a reception)
# to be (a role)
#: {{zh-x|做賊|to thieve}}
#: {{zh-x|做客|to be a guest/visitor}}
# {{lb|zh|euphemism}} to [[make love]]
